snippet: The Los Angeles County Sheriff’s Department moved to fire seven deputies who are accused of being part of a group that allegedly celebrated aggressive tactics and shootings.
abstract: Los Angeles County Sheriff’s Department moves to fire seven deputies who are accused of being part of secret internal group known as Jump Out Boys, which allegedly celebrates aggressive tactics and shootings.
lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles County Sheriff’s Department moved to fire seven deputies who are accused of being part of a group that allegedly celebrated aggressive tactics and shootings.

headline.main: California: Sheriff’s Deputies in Clique to Be Fired
headline.print_headline: California: Sheriff’s Deputies In Clique To Be Fired
